response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. After careful consideration, I propose a purchase price of $1,300,000 for this product. I am confident that this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for my investment and providing you with a significant benefit that aligns well with your valuation of $1,200,000. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1300000}
